eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: organization, client data that may be manually or electronically processes
recoursemech:
The Firm’s US offices will monitor their adherence to the Principles and address questions and concerns regarding their adherence. At least once a year, an authorized representative of the Firm’s US offices will certify that that this statement is accurate, comprehensive for the information intended to be covered, prominently displayed, completely implemented, and accessible. We encourage interested persons to raise any concerns using the contact information from the privacy statement at http://www.cgsh.com/privacy_statement/

Individuals may file a complaint with the contacts named at the above website under “Contact Information” in connection with CGSH's processing of their personal data under the Principles. With respect to any dispute relating to this Policy that cannot be resolved through our internal processes:
•	We will cooperate with competent EU data protection authorities (EU DPAs) and comply with the advice of such authorities. In the event that we or such authorities determine that we did not comply with this Policy, we will take appropriate steps to address any adverse effects and to promote future compliance.
•	Personnel who violate our privacy policies could be subject to disciplinary process.
